The short answer is "maybe"

I'm working on a python implementation but I don't get
as much time to work on it as I'd like.  My ultimate
goal is to explore NEAT and co-evolution as applied to
Texas Hold'em.  No dreams of a super player but it
combines two interests of mine.

It basically boils down to learning enough c++/c# to
implement a poker simulation or implementing NEAT in
python since I already have the poker sim done.

I'll keep the list posted as to any progress I make. 
I have a few more implementation questions that I'll
try and put down in an orderly fashion soon.

Karl

--- Kenneth Stanley <kstanley@...> wrote:
> Karl,
> 
> By the way, are you making your own implementation
